interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Gaming Headphones Chamvict Xbox One Headset with Stereo Sound Ps4 Headset with Mic Noise Canceling for PS4,PC,Laptop,Cell Phone,Xbox,Find Enemies Before They Find You Review Date: 2019/07/17 Store: Chamvict Product Description: ['Why to choose us', "1. 【Splendid stereo audio output】Bring you an immersive game experience with stereo sound.You can get clear sound and accurately judge the enemies’ direction especially in “Playerunknown's Battlegrounds” 2. 【360° Noise canceling mic】We adopt intelligent chip to cancel outside noise.Just enjoy your own game world.You can judge the enemies direction and shoot in time without any noise.Victory is yours!The mic is flexible and can be adjusted to different angle for 360° 3. 【Comfy for long time wearing】With an extreme light of 0.87pounds, it is professionally designed for long time wearing and relieve your tiredness.The earmuff is breathable and soft, which can give your ear a comfy touch with less stress and keep cool when gaming for long time 4. 【Skin-friendly earmuff】Made of superior PU leather material, the earmuff is friendly to your skin 5. 【Convenient volume and mic adjustment】You can adjust game sound volume via the pulley and turn on/off mic via the switch anytime when don’t use it", 'Tips for PS4', '1. Plug 3.5mm cable into the console 2. Long press PS4 button and go to system setting 3. Go to “PERIPHERAL MACHINE”, ”ADJUST SOUND AND DEVICES”, choose “OUTPUT TO THE HEADPHONES”, select “ALL AUDIO”', 'Multiple platform compatibility', '★Play station 4 ★Nintendo switch/3DS ★Cell phone with 3.5mm audio interface ★Xbox one/360: It need a microsoft adapter(not included) when connect to old version xbox one ★Laptop/PC/macbook: Need a pc extension cord(included), plug mic and audio cord into your PC, laptop, macbook', 'Specification', '★Drive Diameter: 50mm ★Frequency: 20HZ-20KHZ ★Sensitivity: 102±3DB ★Mic Diameter: 4.0×1.5mm ★Mic Sensitivity: -38±3DB ★Cable Length: 6.6ft ★Size: 8.1×4.1×8.7inch ★N.W.: 0.873pounds ★G.W.: 1.12Pounds'] Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Chamvict', 'Color': 'Black', 'Form Factor': 'Over Ear', 'Connectivity Technology': 'Wired', 'Special Feature': 'Noise Canceling, Microphone Included', 'Package Dimensions': '9.1 x 7.8 x 4.3 inches; 1.09 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'Dongguan Guanbiao Trading Co.,Ltd'} Review Text: I gave this headset to my 11 year old son. below is his review. From myself I can add that the manual translation is very lazy and disrespectful to the customers.

"I got the headseat and was very eager to use it. The headset definitely did not disappoint. The noise blocking was nice, and the headset felt very comfortable on my ears. For me the headset doesn't fit perfectly, there is a small space between my head and the bottom of the ear pads. I get uses to it after a while but i wish ear pads would fit all the way around. Other than that, I really like the headset and definitely would recommend." Review Title: My son likes this headset Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Oral-B Professional Care Deluxe Electric Toothbrush - Oral-B {'Brand': 'Oral-B', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Special Feature': 'Brushing Timer', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Color': 'Dark Blue/Light Blue'} I bought Oral-B 3000 for my mother and she likes it. Generally, she does not like gadgets and new technology, but this toothbrush is easy to operate. I recommended that she does not charge it after every brushing but rather only when the low battery indicator turns on, and she's been following this suggestion. She tried one of the included small brush heads, but she really prefers the larger double action brush head. I was especially pleased when she told me that she noticed her teeth getting whiter and her mouth feeling fresher. That's all I need to recommend this toothbrush. Mom enjoys it. For me the headset doesn't fit perfectly, there is a small space between my head and the bottom of the ear pads. I get uses to it after a while but i wish ear pads would fit all the way around. Other than that, I really like the headset and definitely would recommend." My son likes this headset
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Genuine Preferences:**
  - Values simplicity and ease of use in products, especially for family members who may not be tech-savvy.
  - Appreciates functionality that enhances everyday routines, including products that cater to children’s experiences (e.g., comfortable gaming gear).
  - Prioritizes personal recommendations based on firsthand experience and practical usability.

- **Patterns:**
  - Engages with reliable brands known for quality and effective results, even in categories outside of health (e.g., technology for gaming).
  - Demonstrates a trend of choosing products that provide noticeable improvements in user experience, whether for health or leisure.
  - Influences family members towards adopting practical solutions, ensuring products are also suitable for younger users.

- **Behavioral Trends:**
  - Focuses on recommending products that exhibit clear benefits and positive outcomes for family members.
  - Shows concern for user feedback, emphasizing features that enhance comfort and usability, especially for children.
  - Experience-driven; willing to test products and share results, offering insights collectively to aid others in informed decision-making.

Overall, the user maintains a strong inclination toward practical, user-friendly products that enhance well-being and comfort, while ensuring family satisfaction, extending their interests from health products to leisure technologies that cater to the family’s needs.
